quote_last: , early for once, and lets herself in with her key, and puts on the mauve-and-aqua smock that Shanita designed for them so the customers will know they aren’t customers themselves.
title: The Robber Bride
author: Margaret Atwood

quote_last:

title: And Then There Were None
